title: Roti Road House Cafe & Health Foods Market
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Indian, Organic, Raw, Western, Buffet, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Caribbean, Catering, Spanish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A cafe inside a market serves some vegan choices, including juices, salad bar items and more. Most vegan choices are not labeled on the online menu; please inquire if they are not labeled on buffet. The market sells organic fruits and veggies, bulk items, herbs, whole body care and more.
